q_greeting.prompt: Welcome to Essence of Oregon support. What brings you here today?

choices.label: I want to cancel my subscription

q_reason.prompt: What is the main reason for canceling?

q_usage.prompt: Have you had a chance to use the product enough to see results?

q_extend_offer.prompt: We can extend your free trial by 15 days at no charge so you can evaluate further. Would you like to accept the extension?

choices.label: No, I'd still like to cancel

q_discount40.prompt: We can offer a lifetime 40% employee discount. Keep the subscription for $50.28/month (from $83.80)?

q_affordable_price.prompt: What monthly price (USD) would make it affordable for you?

end_extended.prompt: Your free trial has been extended by 15 days. Please evaluate and contact us before it ends if you still wish to cancel.

end_keep40.prompt: Great! Your subscription will continue at the 40% discounted rate of $50.28/month.

end_supervisor_80.prompt: Approved by supervisor: lifetime 80% discount. Your monthly price will be $16.76.

end_cancelled.prompt: Understood. Your subscription is canceled. Thank you for trying Essence of Oregon.

end_escalate.prompt: Thanks for the feedback. A specialist will review and follow up regarding your cancellation request.

end_other.prompt: Thanks for reaching out. Please contact support for assistance with non-cancellation inquiries.
